title: MARKDOWN CONVERTER BABEY!!!
body:
hey.. hi everyone. it has been too damn long since i've written one of these. the site truly has had more edits than acknowledged, BUT they're definitely all fairly minor. here's a tangent about how i will alwyas be wormboy, or wormboy will always be a piece of me. and making this site is very meaningful to me and i thinka bout it regularly. wormboy is key to me. and maybe. maybe i should be reconnecting with my worm boy. maybe i should.

anyway. this update comes with a brand new and functioning markdown converter!!! you can find that here if you'd like to check it out ! uses are : worry less about code/html while writing an article or journal for your neocities site; worry less about html when posting a fanfic to a o 3 dot gov; learn mooore about how md and html relate to one another! a little playground maybe?

anyways. i have been... oh i got into half life! i quite like half life. the video game from 1998. kind of beautiful. i'm also tryign to work on my brain health and take care of myself. that is always good. there are a few things i wanted to do with this site in that regard that i never really got around to, and who knows! anyways. i do wanna keep this site built as it is, i think it's fun to play with. makes me think about the basics of javascript and gets my mind away from the complexities of other higher frameowkrs. ohh i want a pbj rn dude. anyways yes yeah so. i'm still workign on my larger site, my more official site. and honestly doing a bit of work here is motivating. i feel better about myself. more myself. i need a job too, but hell dude. i can't really conceal being. a bit silly. that's my main obstacle with a lot of things.

anyways. lots of love from worm bo y 23. mwah!

title: css fix, new article
body:
i MISSED THIS HI!!1 today i fixed the css on my art page, and added a new article.

and because i can, a brief ramble about my life and times. i've been working on a couple other projects, one of which being a fancy professional website that's been taking a lot of time, it's volunteer work but i'm learning a lot, and it's definitely worth it because it'll be replacing a website that nobody uses or likes using right now!

title: SECRET music api launch
body: LOG EDITED what did i do! i made a secret personal api to get myself and my friends spotify data to display on neocities. and it is secret so don't tell anyone ok? i put a lot of work into it though. anyways now will wood and queef jerky on my homepage.

title: link page revamped
body:
that's right babey!!!!!!!!! i have been wanting to do this a while, and so while i'm still sorta low energy, here it is: a compilation of links to free games and tools and resources. this page will be frequently updated as i think of and discover new things i'd like to share. but! here is it's starting point.

note: not merging this with the main branch just yet, as i think i'll rewrite it to be generated like other pages are :]!

anyways, find that HERE!!!!!

title: minor tweaks, progress slowed
body:
guess who has a little bit of burnout ... it is me.

this is ok though, i will be so brave about it. this update comes with a couple lil touches:

  • visible focus styling for links, buttons, and inputs. ex: when you hit tab and cycle through elements on the page.
  • another item in the gallery
  • different nav structure on the tips page.

a little disappointed cuz i wanna have more articles written, but it's ok and i forgive myself. bye bye!!!

ps: now i added meta tags to each page to give it a little theme color for the preview embeds on discord. yay!

title: opened art gallery
body: it's been a while since an update! sidenote: i've done about 3 other projects while working lightly on wormboy whoops still working on other exciting and new things, but this update is the debut of my epic art gallery! more will be added as i dick around.

title: auto populating buttons
body:
i have SO MANY FREINDS!!!!! i'm tired to individually updating every page of my site to include all their beautiful buttons. now they autopopulate. i also have some other new things about the buttons on my page.. a little experimental, but we'll see how it goes. i need more other buttons.

i have been getting really excited about so many projects lately i'm a little scrambled right now but i'm gonna get back into my wormy ways soon enough. worm boy OUT!!!!!!!!

title: header reorganization
body:
okay!!!!!! i didn't expect another update so quick but here's a small one. now the cursor goes grabby grabby on the windows. working on little buttons in my header. i'm not 100% sure how to describe/define the logic by which i place links in my header area, but i'm kinda liking the vibe. i LOVE my little wormies. love them. also had fun making the forklift animations...

but THIS isn't my diary!!!!! more coding tips coming soon, i've got some good stuff for beginners because i am realizing it is needed!

WORMBOYBEDTIME !

title: scrambled blinkies
body:
minor update, long time coming: now all the blinkies shuffle on my page! i may make it so only 20 are put on the page or whatever... but i dunno :] oh and i got a new ico... more worms to come...

currently, the git is a little... off from the actual live site. this is cuz i'm working on more things with the header and overall interface. and i'm having fun with it, i just... eh. i need to get my shit together when it comes to branches!

worm boy out!

title: header 1.0!
body:
this took me a little longer than expected, but i've been doing some other things too...

but here comes the wormboy header! i am still tweaking and working out the design, so the site will be scrollable for now... bear with me as i figure out how i want things to be placed.

coming soon: i swear to god accessibility settings, and a new links page layout :]

title: about update
body:
finally updated my about page with some more detail. definitely not its final form, but here we go...

also, another new tip, this one's quick. plus some minor edits here and there. worm boy bed time....

title: new tutorial!
body:
minor bug fixes around the site's css and ts.

check out the new article here!

title: double click chicken flip
body: desktop only: double clicking on a free-floating image flips it horizontally. try that here! this is HUGE.

title: css polish, links
body:
fixed my css for desktop AND mobile. took the time to learn what i was actually doing!

oh and now this changelog page will automatically open an update based on the hash. [try that here.], finally added a couple of links, more to come [here], and now certain windows will randomly scatter themselves across the page on desktop..... good luck. wormboy away!

title: beginning tutorial page
body:
just BARELY putting this in on the 14th, but anyways...

added a tutorial page. currently labelled 'tips' but i'm not sure if i stick to that. i'm not asking for you to tip me, but 'tutorial' sounds to formal. the idea for this page is for me to document things i learn and have a spot to refer my friends to when they have questions. currently there is but one tutorial up, but the bulk of today's work was getting myself to focus on just one page getting the framework in place. worm boy BED TIME!!!

title: scream!
body:
to get the boring things out of the way... i did a pretty big restructure to the site's file organization! two actually!! but no one cares about that. let's get to the fun stuff:

yell into the void! i'm not sure when i first had the idea for this page, but it didn't take very long to make it a reality. if anyone is out there, let me know what you think of it. it could use some polish regardless, but i may or may not expand on it in the future.

more soon to come. wormboy out!!!!!!!

title: added changelog!
body:
i have created the beginnings of a changelog! and a full changelog page! if you are reading this, you are probably on that changelog page and hitting buttons. i have future plans for this little window to be able to close, or maaaybe to prevent duplicates from opening.. but that's not really fun :(

anyways, i have some work to do with how it displays the changelog list, and how it'll highlight major updates! i have soooooo many other things to be doing but for today, this might be wormboy out!.... byebye!!!!!!

edit: i added more stuff, beginnings for about and links. WORM BOY OUT FORREAL NOW!!!!!
